name: phryk
text:
@roytang Headline had me worry that I need to prepare for armed intruders for a second…

Honestly tho, SEO was essentially entrapment for business idiots from the start and it was obvious that Google actually embracing it would ruin their search engine.

By now, it seems likely, that in a couple years time, people will use different services to find things on the web. Good fucking riddance, I say. :F
